attributes.action: Get iced buns back in Greggs
attributes.additional_details:
Greggs is a national treasure it really is but the shocking news has broken that they are atopping the sale of iced buns and pink donuts!

We dealt with the loss of the sausage and onion roll and even the change of jam in the jam donut but this is a step too far.

Greggs need to see that we will not stand for this and I for one point my (non iced) finger directly at the management !!!
